entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Arviat

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
